channel.title: Analitics on Stork'Studios
channel.description: Recent content in Analitics on Stork'Studios

item.title: Learn about your own game using telemetry
item.description: Knowledge is power Video games are all about having fun. As a developer, you want your players to have a good time. It doesn’t matter whether it’s a crane operator simulator or a fast-paced shooter. You need to create an experience that people will like. The problem is, as the creator you are not a player, at least not a regular one. Your opinion on your game’s features and balance is heavily biased by your experience.
